articles.author: Debashis Sarkar, Aishwarya Panda
articles.title: Motorola Razr 50 Ultra vs Razr 40 Ultra: Should you save ₹30,000 and buy the 2023 foldable smartphone? - HT Tech
articles.description: Motorola Razr 50 Ultra launch price in India is  ₹99,999. But the Motorola Razr 40 Ultra, launched in June 2023, is selling for  ₹69,999 on Amazon. So, here’s a comparison- Motorola Razr 50 Ultra vs Motorola Razr 40 Ultra- to help decide who should buy what.
articles.content: Motorola Razr 50 Ultra has just launched in India at a price of 99,999. Of course, there are bank offers which you can apply to bring the price down to 89,999. But the good news is that Motorola is g… [+5288 chars]
